page.title: 19SHETLAND DIALECT
page.content: VAGALAND'S POEM "SHETLANRIE"TELLS US THAT LOTS OF PEOPLE THINK THAT THE SHETLAND DIALECT IS OUT_DATED.BUT HE THINKS THAT IT SHOULD BE PRESERVED AS AN IMPORTANT FACET OF SHETLAND LIFE. MOST COMMONLY USED DIALECT WORDS IN OUR CLASS {HOME_LIFE WILD-LIFE PEERIE-SMALL SKORIE_YOUNG GULL NEEP-TURNIP BONXIE_GREAT SKUA SMUCK-SLIPPER TAMMY NORIE-PUFFIN GANZEY-JERSEY TIRRICK-ARCTIC TERN GUTTER-MUD SCARF-CORMORANT SLESTER-MESS OLICK-YOUNG LING BRUKK-RUBBISH PILTOCK-COALFISH GIRSE-GRASS WHITRIT-STOAT RAAN-FISH ROE NEESICK-PORPOISE ESSIKERT-REFUSE LORRY FANTIN-HUNGRY MAKKIN-KNITTING WIRES-KNITTING NEEDLES TUSHKAR-PEAT CUTTER
